name: Learn Malaysia Fast and Free
description: Learning Malaysia is really much easier than you think. Thats one of the reasons I created Learn Malaysia fast and free. I want to point out how simple the Malaysian language is if you follow the right method. This application is developed by Malaysian language professionals, including more than 6000+ common words and phrases with 64 categories. Search perfectly and manage your favorite system items. This is a pocket communication dictionary, recommended for anyone who wants to learn Malaysian including children, students, tourists and businessmen. Games and quizzes that support Malaysian language learning This app helps you translate Malay words into multiple languages at once (39 languages). Users can record voice and create your favorite word list. Learning Malaysia without an internet connection is free.
